data.text: Monga momwe mbalame zimawulukira uku ndi uku
Amowabu aja anawuza a ku Yuda kuti,
Lolani kuti anthu othawa nkhondo a ku Mowabu azikhala pakati panu;
Kotero Ine ndikulira, monga mmene akulirira anthu a ku Yazeri,
Chimwemwe ndi chisangalalo zalekeka ku minda yanu ya zipatso;
Chifukwa chake moyo wanga ukulira ngati pangwe kulirira Mowabu,
Awa ndi mawu amene Yehova wayankhula kale zokhudza Mowabu.

Koma tsopano Yehova akuti, “Zisanathe zaka zitatu, potsata mʼmene munthu waganyu amawerengera, ulemerero wa Mowabu udzakhala utatheratu ndipo anthu ake ambiri adzakhala atawonongeka, ndipo opulumuka ake adzakhala ochepa ndi ofowoka.”
